data.title: Dozens of condo scam victims seek help
data.description: A group of 70 people have filed complaints with the Department of Special Investigation (DSI) claiming they were duped into purchasing  condominium units , resulting in total losses of 3 billion baht.

data.title: PM calls for comprehensive flood mitigation measures in the South
data.description: Paetongtarn promises to visit flood-hit region again to oversee progress

data.title: Explore the magic of rare rose varieties at Siam Paragon exhibition
data.description: Entry is free at event that displays some types for the first time in Thailand

data.title: Thai doctor warns of missing deadly viruses from Australian lab
data.description: Over 300 lab tubes contain BSL-4 pathogens that require the highest level of biosafety containment

data.title: ‘No public forum’ on Cambodia pact
data.description: No public forum will be held on the controversial 2001 memorandum of understanding (MoU) with  Cambodia  on maritime claims  in the Gulf of Thailand, Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said on Wednesday.

data.title: Cabinet approves new laws for 15% minimum corporate tax
data.description: Move expected to attract investors and boost revenue by THB10 billion

data.title: Thai foreign minister visiting South Australia
data.description: Bilateral cooperation has been highlighted in the fields of agricultural technology, alternative energy and education during a visit by Foreign Affairs Minister Maris Sangiampongsa to Adelaide, the capital of South Australia.

data.title: Thai-German rail pact renewed
data.description: Thailand and Germany have renewed an agreement on  rail development , a long-term commitment to address several key problems with an efficient and environmentally friendly rail transport system.

data.title: Nearly 17.5 million motorists will be travelling during NY break
data.description: The upcoming New Year holiday is expected to see a historic surge in people returning to their hometowns or travelling across provinces after the Covid-19 pandemic, Transport Minister Suriya Jungrungreangkit said on Wednesday.

data.title: 14-year-old fatally stabbed by teen friend in Sattahip
data.description: CHON BURI - A 14-year-old Thai-Australian schoolboy was  stabbed to death  by his friend at the entrance of a housing estate in Sattahip district on Tuesday night. The teen attacker was subsequently arrested.

data.title: Mitr Phol collaborates with cane growers to harvest green sugarcane to boost incomes and foster a better environment
data.description: Pioneering sugarcane leaf purchase for the 7th year with a goal of purchasing 700,000 tons during 2024/2025 milling season

data.title: Investor confidence at neutral as Thai markets await US trade policies
data.description: Government economic stimulus measures and tourism recovery seen as key catalysts

data.title: Wildly drunk tourist charged with assaulting police
data.description: PHUKET – A Belarusian tourist faces charges after allegedly attacking police and security guards while extremely intoxicated - and his wife and children are returning home without him.

data.title: BMA partners with TikTok to expand BKK Food Bank project in Bangkok
data.description: City Hall hopes to make TikTok’s millions of users aware of sharing surplus food and addressing social inequality in the capital

data.title: Thailand launches new relief initiative to tackle household debts
data.description: The ‘You Fight, We Help’ project aims to help 1.9 million people deal with loans taken to buy a home, car or run a small business

data.title: SEA-TEP Model: Shaping the Future of Teacher Education
data.description: Teachers are the cornerstone of shaping future generations to tackle 21st-century challenges. Recognizing their pivotal role,  SEAMEO STEM-ED (The Southeast Asian Ministers of Education Organization Regional Centre for STEM Education),  through the Chevron-funded education initiative, has launched the  SEA-TEP (Southeast Asian Teacher Education Program)  in Thailand, Cambodia, Indonesia, Kazakhstan, and Malaysia to equip teachers with essential practices to deliver high-quality instruction related to STEM, setting a benchmark for regional and global education transformation through teacher education and development from the upstream.

data.title: 1 killed in fatal wild elephant attack in Phu Kradueng
data.description: National park officials say there are plenty of signs warning people to stay away from the area where the 49-year-old was reportedly killed

data.title: Thresher shark found beached on Koh Phi Phi  returned to sea
data.description: The staff of the Had Noppharat Thara-Mu Ko Phi Phi National Park and local villagers saved a thresher shark on Wednesday that was found beached on Phi Phi Don Island on Tuesday, and safely returned it to the sea.

data.title: Phiphat confident THB400 minimum wage will start from Jan 1
data.description: Labour minister also hints at other New Year gifts for Thai people

data.title: Philippine VP doubts she will survive impeachment
data.description: MANILA - Philippine Vice President  Sara Duterte  expressed doubts on Wednesday about getting enough support from legislators to fight  impeachment  complaints filed against her, saying the process is a “political activity”.

data.title: Tourist killed by wild elephant in Phu Kradueng park
data.description: A tourist was killed by a wild elephant in Phu Krabueng National Park on Tuesday, and alarmed officials declared some areas closed to visitors.

data.title: PEA rules out irregularities in overseas electricity distribution
data.description: Deputy governor vows PEA will act if any illegal activities come to light

data.title: The art of falling mid-air
data.description: Moca Bangkok presents "In Just A Blink Of An Eye", a thought-provoking performance piece by renowned Chinese contemporary artist Xu Zhen.

data.title: Motor Expo 2024 sees record bookings despite market challenges
data.description: Toyota leads the bookings followed by BYD and Honda, reflecting growing consumer interest despite challenges from stricter lending policies

data.title: No tolls on Pak Chong-Korat M6 Motorway during 5-day New Year break
data.description: The Highways Department waives toll fees to ensure motorists heading to the Northeast can bypass heavy traffic in the heart of Nakhon Ratchasima

data.title: Festive Brilliance at lebua: A New Luxury Era
data.description: This festive season, lebua Hotels & Resorts ushers in a transformative era, redefining luxury and excitement for Bangkok’s holiday celebrations. From December 16, 2024, to January 5, 2025, lebua presents an unparalleled festive programme, blending fine dining, cutting-edge entertainment, and breathtaking panoramic views.

data.title: Foxconn subsidiary gets BOI privileges to build factories in Thailand
data.description: Taiwanese firm to establish two semiconductor factories in Chonburi and Rayong, with an investment of 10.5 billion baht, creating over 1,400 jobs
